certifications.title: AWS Certified AI Practitioner
certifications.description: Foundational cloud knowledge and AWS services
certifications.summary: When I entered my school's term 2 break, I decided to delve into a cloud service, as I had never used one before. I chose AWS, and completed the AWS Certified AI Practitioner certification, and gained a foundational understanding of AWS services and cloud computing principles. This certification was a great introduction into AWS and the cloud in general.

certifications.title: IBM AI Engineering
certifications.description: Machine learning and deep learning fundamentals
certifications.summary: As the end of 2024 drew closer, I realised that although I had a good understanding of AI and machine learning, I didn't have a deep understanding of the underlying principles and technologies. So, in my school's term 3 break, I decided to complete the IBM AI Engineering certification, and gain deeper insight into how machine and deep learning really functions.
